name: Wizard Rune Wars
description:
Controls:

WASD - Move player

LMB - Shoot spell

Space - Dash move

1, 2, 3 - Switch staffs

Tab - Place runes into staff

P - Pause the game

Enter - Go to next stage after defeating a boss.

Game:

Fight evil wizards for control over the most powerful Runes! Use them to enchant your weapons and yourself with magical abilities. Each rune improves a weapon with other runes to create powerful wands. Become the one who rules them all!

A game developed for the Big Festive Game Jam 2022.
Theme: Exponential Possibilities.
December 3rd, 2022 to December 12th, 2022.

Developed by Clayton Blough and Jan Cenzartowicz.

Terrain art from https://www.kenney.nl/assets/pixel-shmup

Font from https://www.dafont.com/alphakind.font
